name: jacobandreas
body:
### Tools

[igor](github.com/jacobandreas/igor) (experiment management framework)

[scalanlp/breeze](github.com/scalanlp.breeze) (scala numerical computing library)

### Research

[lllm](github.com/jacobandreas/lllm) (log-linear language model)

[comp-vsm](github.com/jacobandreas/comp-vsm) (vector space semantics)

[smt-semparse](github.com/jacobandreas/smt-semparse) (semantic parsing as machine translation)

### Miscellany

[haggadah](github.com/jacobandreas/haggadah) (the Columbia-Commune-Churchill-California Free Haggadah)

### Juvenalia

[redglove](github.com/jacobandreas/redglove) (Minority Report input device)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
